title: Mount Bromo Spectacular Sunrise
description: Experience the breathtaking sunrise at Mount Bromo, one of Indonesia's most iconic landscapes. This tour takes you through the Sea of Sand to the peak for a perfect view of the sunrise over the caldera.
terms: Booking must be made at least 3 days before departure. Cancellation within 24 hours will incur a 50% fee.

title: Bali Paradise Island Getaway
description: Discover the beauty of Bali with this comprehensive tour package. Visit the famous temples, enjoy stunning beaches, and experience the unique Balinese culture.
terms: Booking confirmation subject to availability. Free cancellation up to 7 days before departure.

title: Yogyakarta Heritage Tour
description: Explore the rich cultural heritage of Yogyakarta, from the magnificent Borobudur and Prambanan temples to the vibrant art scene and traditional crafts of the city.
terms: Minimum 2 participants required. Tour itinerary subject to change based on local conditions.

title: Raja Ampat Diving Adventure
description: Dive into the crystal-clear waters of Raja Ampat, home to the world's richest marine biodiversity. Explore vibrant coral reefs, encounter unique fish species, and experience true underwater paradise.
terms: Divers must have PADI Open Water certification or equivalent. Medical clearance required.

title: Komodo Island Dragon Expedition
description: Embark on an adventure to meet the prehistoric Komodo dragons in their natural habitat. Trek through the rugged terrain of Komodo Island and snorkel in the pristine waters of Pink Beach.
terms: Medium fitness level required. Not suitable for children under 10 years old.
